Uses of Class
NPC

    • Uses of NPC in <Unnamed>

      Subclasses of NPC in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Companion
      The companion extends NPC and has an additional field that is an Item gift for the user.
      class  Mob
      The Mob extends NPC and has an additional field that is the int cmount of attack.
      class  Vendor
      The Vendor extends NPC and has an additional field for the currency it carries.
      Fields in <Unnamed> with type parameters of type NPC 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,NPC> Dungeon.npcs
      Data structure storing all possible NPCs.
      private java.util.ArrayList<NPC> Room.npcs
      Data structure used to store NPC objects which in game are present in the Room.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return NPC 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) NPC Room.getNpcNamed(java.lang.String name)
      Takes in a String as a search parameter, representing the name of a NPC object.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type NPC 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void Room.add(NPC npc)
      Takes in an NPC object and adds it to the Room's npcs array list.
      (package private) void Room.remove(NPC npc)
      Takes in an NPC object and removes it from the Room's npcs array list.
